name: Happy Scratch
description:
Play the new popular game including scratch cards and claw machine every day! 100% free to play! Check your fortune today! Happy scratch is a great day that you can earn free rewards easily.

Begin your journey of happy scratch for a chance to win bonus and big prizes. We wish you good luck on daily lucky scratcher and claw machine games, which cost you nothing, just enjoy playing!

★★★★Game Features★★★★

►You will have free chance to scratch cards everyday!
►Daily bonus with abundant coins. Chances to win jackpot!
►Enjoy the game whenever you want. No internet required after installation!

★★★★User Experience Improvement★★★★
Please contact our email to give us suggestions and comments for better user experience.
